item.title: Does Allah (Ø¬) _need_ our praise?
item.description: Missy A few months ago I found a poor kitty who was merely skin and bones, but most probably, she had been someone’s discarded or abandoned pet because she was not feral; she was friendly and let me pet her. She seemed to have a lot of health issues, so I took her to the vet, where, for some strange reason, she began hyperventilating: It was heartbreaking but I was not going to give up on her.
